# DO NOT EDIT THIS FILE! THIS FILE IS AUTOMATICALLY GENERATED BY xml2cmake
PROJECT(sw4img_database)

ADD_DATABASE_CODE_GEN_TARGETS(sw4img)

SET(COMMON_SOURCES
sw4imgPluginInfo.C
sw4imgCommonPluginInfo.C
)

SET(LIBI_SOURCES
sw4imgPluginInfo.C
)

SET(LIBM_SOURCES
sw4imgMDServerPluginInfo.C
${COMMON_SOURCES}
avtsw4imgFileFormat.C
)

SET(LIBE_SOURCES
sw4imgEnginePluginInfo.C
${COMMON_SOURCES}
avtsw4imgFileFormat.C
)

INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(
${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}
${VISIT_DATABASE_INCLUDES}
)

LINK_DIRECTORIES(${VISIT_LIBRARY_DIR} )

ADD_LIBRARY(Isw4imgDatabase ${LIBI_SOURCES})
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(Isw4imgDatabase visitcommon)
SET(INSTALLTARGETS Isw4imgDatabase)

IF(NOT VISIT_ENGINE_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_DBIO_ONLY)
    ADD_LIBRARY(Msw4imgDatabase ${LIBM_SOURCES})
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(Msw4imgDatabase visitcommon avtdbatts avtdatabase_ser )
    ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(Msw4imgDatabase MDSERVER)
    SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} Msw4imgDatabase)
ENDIF(NOT VISIT_ENGINE_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_DBIO_ONLY)

ADD_LIBRARY(Esw4imgDatabase_ser ${LIBE_SOURCES})
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(Esw4imgDatabase_ser visitcommon avtpipeline_ser avtdatabase_ser )
ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(Esw4imgDatabase_ser ENGINE)
SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} Esw4imgDatabase_ser)

IF(VISIT_PARALLEL)
    ADD_PARALLEL_LIBRARY(Esw4imgDatabase_par ${LIBE_SOURCES})
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(Esw4imgDatabase_par visitcommon avtpipeline_par avtdatabase_par )
    ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(Esw4imgDatabase_par ENGINE)
    SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} Esw4imgDatabase_par)
ENDIF(VISIT_PARALLEL)

VISIT_INSTALL_DATABASE_PLUGINS(${INSTALLTARGETS})
VISIT_PLUGIN_TARGET_OUTPUT_DIR(databases ${INSTALLTARGETS})
VISIT_PLUGIN_TARGET_FOLDER(databases sw4img ${INSTALLTARGETS})
